mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cash_flow_statement( security_code, report_date, date_type, cash_in_sale_good_labour_service, net_increase_in_deposit, net_increase_in_loan_from_bank, net_increase_in_loan_from_bank_institution, cash_in_original_insurance_contract, net_cash_in_reinsure, net_increase_deposit_investment, net_increase_in_financial_asset, cash_in_interest_commission, net_increase_borrow_fund, net_reduce_loan_advances, net_increase_buyback_foud, tax_return, cash_in_other_business, sum_cash_revenue, buy_good_labour_service_payable, net_increase_in_loan_advances, net_increase_in_deposit_in_bank, insurance_contract_payable, interest_commission_payable, dividend_payable, employee_payable, tax_payable, other_business_payable, sum_cash_payable, net_cash_in_business, cash_by_investment, cash_by_investment_received, cash_by_dispose_asset, cash_by_dispose_subsidiary, cash_by_reduce_pledge_and_deposit, cash_by_other_investment, sum_investment_revenue, buy_asset_payable, investment_payable, net_increase_in_pledge_loan, get_subsidiary_payable, cash_by_add_pledge_and_deposit, other_investment_payable, sum_investment_payable, net_cash_in_investment, cash_by_accept_investment, cash_by_accept_subsidiary, cash_by_loan, cash_by_issuance_of_bonds, cash_by_other_financing, sum_financing_revenue, repayment_debt_payable, dividend_profit_interest_payable, subsidiary_payable, buy_subsidiary_payable, other_financing_payable, subsidiary_reduce_capital, sum_financing_payable, net_cash_in_financing, effect_exchange_rate, net_increase_in_cash_equi, cash_in_period_beginning, cash_in_period_ending ) VALUES ( #{item.securityCode}, #{item.reportDate}, #{item.dateType}, #{item.cashInSaleGoodLabourService}, #{item.netIncreaseInDeposit}, #{item.netIncreaseInLoanFromBank}, #{item.netIncreaseInLoanFromBankInstitution}, #{item.cashInOriginalInsuranceContract}, #{item.netCashInReinsure}, #{item.netIncreaseDepositInvestment}, #{item.netIncreaseInFinancialAsset}, #{item.cashInInterestCommission}, #{item.netIncreaseBorrowFund}, #{item.netReduceLoanAdvances}, #{item.netIncreaseBuybackFoud}, #{item.taxReturn}, #{item.cashInOtherBusiness}, #{item.sumCashRevenue}, #{item.buyGoodLabourServicePayable}, #{item.netIncreaseInLoanAdvances}, #{item.netIncreaseInDepositInBank}, #{item.insuranceContractPayable}, #{item.interestCommissionPayable}, #{item.dividendPayable}, #{item.employeePayable}, #{item.taxPayable}, #{item.otherBusinessPayable}, #{item.sumCashPayable}, #{item.netCashInBusiness}, #{item.cashByInvestment}, #{item.cashByInvestmentReceived}, #{item.cashByDisposeAsset}, #{item.cashByDisposeSubsidiary}, #{item.cashByReducePledgeAndDeposit}, #{item.cashByOtherInvestment}, #{item.sumInvestmentRevenue}, #{item.buyAssetPayable}, #{item.investmentPayable}, #{item.netIncreaseInPledgeLoan}, #{item.getSubsidiaryPayable}, #{item.cashByAddPledgeAndDeposit}, #{item.otherInvestmentPayable}, #{item.sumInvestmentPayable}, #{item.netCashInInvestment}, #{item.repaymentDebtPayable}, #{item.dividendProfitInterestPayable}, #{item.subsidiaryPayable}, #{item.buySubsidiaryPayable}, #{item.otherFinancingPayable}, #{item.subsidiaryReduceCapital}, #{item.sumFinancingPayable}, #{item.netCashInFinancing}, #{item.effectExchangeRate}, #{item.netIncreaseInCashEqui}, #{item.cashInPeriodBeginning}, #{item.cashInPeriodEnding} )ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
